special_text:
Creatures you control enter with your choice of an additional +1/+1 counter or a haste counter.
[+1]: Look at the top card of your library. If it's a land or creature card, you may reveal it and put it into your hand.
[-8]: You get an emblem with “If a permanent you own would leave the battlefield, you may exile it instead. You may play it for as long as it remains exiled.”
